championship series, took place between the Arizona Diamondbacks of the 
National League and the three-time defending champions New York Yankees of 
the American League. The Diamondbacks won the best-of-seven series four 
games to three. ... Randy Johnson and Curt Schilling were named the series co-
MVPs.
